data.message: i don't know how many of you actually are into rap battles, or even seen total slaughter, but this shit was a joke. Niggas choking, niggas who are held up to high standards can't rhyme better then sesame street. man this shit was a failure. go watch URL on youtube for real battles, this sum bullshit

replies.message: They're just liking it cuz it was something Eminem was associated with the production, But you're right Total Slaughter was straight up garbage
